5_main module¶

5_main.eval_score(X_test, y_test, model_name)¶
Parameters

name – X_test - test dataset y_pred - prediction made model_name - name of the model desired

Returns

accuracy of the model

5_main.load_datasets()¶
Returns

the train and test datasets, X, y

Parameters

name – model_name - name of the model desired

Returns

the model desired loaded

5_main.make_prediction(X_test, model_name)¶
Parameters

Returns

the prediction of the model on test set, unseen data
